snippet: Jeff Carter and Dwight King each had a goal and an assist to lead the Los Angeles Kings past the host Columbus Blue Jackets, 4-3.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Carter and Dwight King each had a goal and an assist to lead the Los Angeles Kings past the host Columbus Blue Jackets, 4-3.

headline.main: Kings Slip Past the Blue Jackets
headline.print_headline: Kings Slip Past the Blue Jackets
